class.name: CertifiedDataTest

javadoc.text: Test SummaryStatistics - implementations that do not store the data * and use single pass algorithms to compute statistics
Test DescriptiveStatistics - implementations that store full array of * values and execute multi-pass algorithms
loads a DescriptiveStatistics off of a test file
